name: Hitwicket - Cricket Manager Game
description:
Fan of IPL T20 Cricket?

Create the legacy of your own cricket team like your dream IPL team in this super addictive cricket game

  • Take part in the Live exciting Player Auction and buy players before your rivals steal them!
  • Battle with your friends and rivals with careful planning and shrewd match tactics like Virat Kohli or finish the match the MS Dhoni style and win matches to be World Champions!
  • Negotiate and Trade your players with managers from around the World.
  • Form an Alliance with your friends and 'Co-operate to Dominate!'
  • Prove your ability in this virtual game and you could be elected by users to lead the National Team in the World Cup!
  • Watch your Live T20 matches or catch your cricket match's highlights! .
  • Assemble a squad of young cricket prodigies and fight it out in the U20 Cup!

    • Note: Hitwicket Cricket Manager 2016 is a FREE Cricket Game, however you can optionally choose to enhance your gaming experience by making in-app purchases. No need to pay to be the Best team In Hitwicket!

    Have any queries? We are available at support@hitwicket.com
